items.title: Peru imposes curfew in province where 13 mine workers were killed
items.description: A local prosecutor says there is a "war" raging in the area between illegal and legal gold miners.

items.title: Germany's Merz falls short of majority in vote for chancellor
items.description: Conservative Friedrich Merz unexpectedly falls short of the numbers needed to become chancellor.

items.title: Hamas says 'no point' to truce talks as Israel plans to capture all of Gaza
items.description: The UN also expresses alarm after Israel approves a new plan that may include seizing all of Gaza indefinitely and controlling aid.

items.title: How Kashmir attack victim's widow went from symbol of tragedy to trolling target
items.description: Himanshi Narwal's husband was among the victims of the deadly militant attack in Indian-administered Kashmir.

items.title: Sudan paramilitaries escalate attacks on key city
items.description: Drones hit the civilian section of Port Sudan's airport, a fuel depot and a major hotel.
